name: Mythic Pieces
description:
Mythic Pieces is a puzzle game about moving around pieces of the level.

Rearrange all the pieces to create a path that leads to the end of the level. Can you fit all the pieces together in the correct way?

Created for the Curdle Jam #21. Theme: "fitting in".

This prototype currently features a "tutorial" level and a "level 1".

I created this game mainly because I wanted to create a game in Godot to learn how to use the engine.

Links:
